WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Autofilter is not implemented in PEAR Spreadsheet_Excel_writer, which is the base of our Excel5 writer.

It will not be implemented by us, as Excel5 is not our main focus and is just added for backwards compatibility.
WorkItem.Description:
After enabling AutoFilter by setAutoFilter method and saving file to Excel5 format there is no AutoFilter enabled in output file. File is opening properly, but there is no AutoFilter.
Whene the same file saving to Excel2007 AutoFilter is working OK.
Â 
I tried this on my own scripts and on file: 10autofilter.php from Tests directory.
WorkItem.Summary: AutoFilter doesn't work when saving to Excel5
